text: int main ( ) { int t , i , sum , c ; long long int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & n ) ; long long a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; sum = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { c = 1 ; while ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] && i < n - 1 ) { c ++ ; i ++ ; } sum += ( c * ( c - 1 ) ) / 2 ; } printf ( "%lld\n" , sum + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
